duties_responsibilities.duty: Generating new mortgage loan applications through self-driven marketing and customer prospecting.
Evaluating borrower financial information and creditworthiness to determine eligibility for loans.
Advising borrowers on available loan products and assisting in the selection of the most suitable option.
Guiding borrowers through the loan application process, ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements and internal policies.
Maintaining contact with borrowers and providing support throughout the loan approval and closing process.
Working independently to generate loan business and meet sales targets.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Business, or a related field (Mortgage License required)
